item.title: Building an Offline Tech Toolkit for Rural Missouri
item.description: When the grid and cloud go silent, here’s a comprehensive toolkit of power, comms, and gear that will still work in rural Missouri.

item.title: Offline and Resilient Tech Toolkit
item.description: How to stay connected and productive when the internet or power goes down.
